name: Prague
description: The capital city, known for its Old Town Square, the Astronomical Clock, and the Charles Bridge.

name: Český Krumlov
description: A picturesque town with a historic castle, charming streets, and the Vltava River.

name: Plzeň
description: Famous for Pilsner beer, the Pilsner Urquell Brewery, and the Gothic St. Bartholomew's Cathedral.

name: Karlovy Vary
description: Renowned spa town with hot springs, colonnades, and the International Film Festival.

name: Brno
description: The second-largest city, home to the Špilberk Castle, Villa Tugendhat, and a vibrant cultural scene.

name: Kutná Hora
description: Historic town with the Gothic St. Barbara's Church and the Sedlec Ossuary, known as the Bone Church.

name: Bohemian Switzerland
description: A national park with stunning sandstone formations, the Pravčická Archway, and beautiful hiking trails.

name: Terezín
description: Historical site of the Terezín concentration camp, now a memorial and museum.

name: Hřensko
description: Gateway to the Bohemian Switzerland National Park, known for the Elbe Sandstone Mountains and scenic boat rides.

name: Moravian Karst
description: A karst landscape with caves, gorges, and the famous Macocha Abyss.
